Dialogs.Text: Modder: You see, there was a legend you touched on your channel a couple of months ago, one pertaining to this chat.
LostDecipher2: A legend... Oh, you mean 'The machine of sever 3'?
Modder: Precisely, and you are going to help me find it.
LostDecipher2: Dude, it's just a legend. It's true that you could do a lot of things with the tools of the chat but...
LostDecipher2: An algorithm that does art by itself? With this?
Modder: It's not just a legend, and you know that.
LostDecipher2: I know? What do you mean?
Modder: I'm going to give you what my investigation entailed in a folder. But long story short...
Modder: You were here when the rumor started.
Modder: Now you know, hehe, don't bother, you are not going to guess. It's been years since that.
Modder: What's important is that you are going to help me find it, i have someone interested in the story.
Modder: I can give you a cut of that and also, the prime information for a video. You will be the first confirming it's true.
Modder: Come on, it's a win win!
LostDecipher2: Sounds good. But you know, i'm also interested in the person who i'm working with. What if i don't want to work with you?
Modder: Oh, so now you are interested in checking backgrounds.
Modder: Too late for that. If you are not interested, want to see what happens if people knew who you were? (To be continued...)
